Title: Rick Potion #9
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Justin Roiland, Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: After Rick gives Morty a Love-potion for prom, things quickly spiral out of control when the Serum splices with the Flu - causing it to spread. Rick and Morty scramble to cure the crisis, making matters worse in the process.
